biotools.summary: The MolAxis web server allows users to identify transmembrane channels in proteins and channels in macromolecules that connect buried cavities to the external surface. Gating residues, channel lining residues and a 3D graphical representation of the channel surface are output.

bioschemas.name: MolAxis
bioschemas.summary: The MolAxis web server allows users to identify transmembrane channels in proteins and channels in macromolecules that connect buried cavities to the external surface. Gating residues, channel lining residues and a 3D graphical representation of the channel surface are output.
